constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 45 (Wednesday, March 10, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. McHENRY:
H.R. 1759.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, clause 2 provides Congress with the
power to ``dispose of and make all needful rules and
Regulations respecting the Territory and other Property
belonging to the United States.''
[Page H1327]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

title: Blue Ridge National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act of 2021
